column2: Workers claim Wal-Mart closed California store in retaliationWorkers claim Wal-Mart closed California store in retaliation Some employees accused Wal-Mart Stores Inc on Friday of closing a location in the Los Angeles area for six months in retaliation for workers demanding for better wages and benefits.
